info.task: increment a slider thumb to the maximum value
info.title: Increment a slider thumb to the maximum value in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSlider
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first slider thumb

user: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, set its value to 250.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Hotel Minimum Price in US dollars' slider thumb, set its value to 250.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.
